section.title: Why EduPulse?
section.content: Every student needs a dose of motivation. EduPulse does more than track health; it inspires. With daily motivational quotes displayed on your wristband, it's a constant reminder to stay positive and driven. These quotes are specially curated to uplift your spirits and boost your study morale.

section.title: Why Proactive Health Notifications?
section.content: Prevention is better than cure, especially in a student's life where every moment counts. EduPulse's proactive health notifications are designed to alert you about potential health issues before they become a problem. This foresight allows you to adjust your schedule and study plans, ensuring you're always at the peak of your health and productivity.
